cause.description:
1 in 6 women are sexually assaulted. 80% of women who are raped are under 30. --RAINN website.
RAINN {rape abuse and incest national network} is the largest anti sexual assualt organization in the country. It has established a completely confidential hotline for victims of rape to call or access online. They also seek to inform others on how to prevent sexual assault!
1. educates public about sexual assault
2. better services for victims
3. better ways to bring justice to victims
cause.mission: raise awareness, and stop the fear.
cause.name: SUPPORT RAINN!
